locutie.beschrijving: The sermon explores the metaphor of the 'Balm of Gilead' as a type for Christ. It details Jeremiah's grief over Israel's sin and parallels the botanical properties of the balsam tree (imported, unattractive, pierced) with the incarnation and passion of Jesus.
locutie.exegetische_kwaliteit: Strong historical-metaphorical exegesis. It moves from the literal balsam of the Ishmaelites to a Christological interpretation of Isaiah 53.

illocutie.beschrijving: The primary force is descriptive and illustrative. The preacher is 'showing' the hearer the beauty of the Savior through historical and biblical analogies.
voorbeelden: Jeremiah saw in his people the awful symptoms of this dread disease of sin.
The healing power in the balm tree was in the thick liquid which flowed out of the tree.

perlocutie.beoogd_effect: The hearer should feel the weight of sin and the sufficiency of Christ's sacrifice, leading to a sense of comfort and awe.
perlocutie.pneumatologisch_bewustzijn: Low. The Spirit is not explicitly invoked as the agent of the 'event', though the 'spiritual pilgrimage' is mentioned.

voorbeelden: Jeremiah spoke out of a deep ache.
There is a disease in our humanity.
The tree in Gilead... was a kind of shrub.
Call it by some polite name if this will make you feel better.
All the ends of the world, hear!
I felt no shame in taking the points.
I do know that she has been hearing that preacher ever since.
How sad to see the people of the Lord trying to be something else.
He shall save his people from their sins.
Christ heals, heals all, heals sweetly.
commissieven.kwaliteit: The promises are mostly quoted as biblical facts (Assertive-Commissives) rather than direct first-person promises from God through the preacher.

voorbeelden: With his stripes we are healed.
declaratieven.autoriteit: The authority is derived from the text (Isaiah), but the preacher rarely steps into the 'I declare to you' persona.

indicatoren: Extensive biographical introduction (50 years ago, Boston University).
Long descriptions of the balsam tree's botanical properties.
Third-person historical narrative of Jeremiah's feelings.
constatief_surplus_analyse.effect_op_hoorder: The hearer becomes a spectator of a historical and biological lecture rather than a participant in a salvific event.

missende_elementen: Direct promise to the specific congregation
Present-tense address of the Spirit's work

toezegging_check.kwaliteit_toezeggen: General and third-person; lacks the 'I promise you in the name of Christ' force.

eerste_persoon.gebruik: Mostly autobiographical (my papers, my father, I know).

tweede_persoon.gebruik: Rhetorical questions (Do you ever feel pain?) and hypothetical scenarios.

derde_persoon.gebruik: Dominant. Talking about Jeremiah, the people, the tree, and Jesus.
derde_persoon.distantie_effect: High. It creates a 'gallery' effect where we look at portraits of the past.

verleden_tijd.gebruik: Jeremiah's context and the preacher's biography.

tijdloos_present.gebruik: Theological truths about sin and Christ's nature.

foutief_patroon.beschrijving: The sermon moves from Assertive (The tree bled) to a weak Directive/Assertive hybrid (We know he heals).
voorbeelden: We know at levels deeper than reason... Christ heals.
foutief_patroon.probleem: It describes the healing as a known fact rather than performing the healing through the word.

voorbeelden_goede_verhouding: With his stripes we are healed... All the ends of the world, hear!
voorbeelden_slechte_verhouding: Say that what is wrong with us is 'ignorance'... Jeremiah would tell us...

diagnostische_evaluatie.diagnose_toelichting: The sermon functions primarily as a beautiful, poetic lecture on the typology of the Balm of Gilead. It informs the hearer about the sufficiency of Christ but stops short of being the vehicle of that sufficiency.

sterke_punten.tekstueel_bewijs: The three qualities of the balm tree.
sterke_punten.effect: Creates a vivid mental image of Christ's work.

zwakke_punten.tekstueel_bewijs: The long introduction about the preacher's father and Boston University.
zwakke_punten.probleem: Wastes homiletical energy on non-kerygmatic information.

diagnostische_evaluatie.gebeuren_toelichting: It is a 'talk about' an event (the Cross) rather than the Cross becoming an event 'now'.
diagnostische_evaluatie.sacramentele_toelichting: Lacks declarative 'I' language that mediates grace directly.

openbaringsleer.god_als_spreker: Implicitly, through the text, but the preacher speaks mostly as a witness to a tradition.
openbaringsleer.prediker_als_mandataris: Weak. The preacher identifies more as a 'son of his father' than a 'messenger of the King'.
tekstueel_bewijs: The points of the sermon are still his [my father's].

pneumatologie.perlocutie_theologie: The preacher relies on the 'beauty' of the metaphor to move the heart.

sacramentstheologie.preek_als_genademiddel: The sermon describes the means of grace (Christ) but does not function as one.
sacramentstheologie.epifanisch_taalgebruik: Moderate. The imagery of the 'crimson flow' has epiphanic potential.
tekstueel_bewijs: His broken body... has opened the way to wholeness.

aanbevelingen.werkwoord_audit_samenvatting: Too many past-tense 'was' and 'did' verbs. Needs a shift to present-tense 'is' and 'does' directed at the 'you'.

specifieke_suggesties.voorgestelde_revisie: Tonight, Christ is here to heal *your* soul's disease.
specifieke_suggesties.verschil: Shifts from a general truth to a specific encounter.

toezegging_versterking.probleem: The promise is buried in a hymn quote.
voorbeeldzinnen: On behalf of Christ, I promise you: his stripes have healed you.

adressering_verbetering.suggestie: Collapse the distance between Gilead and the pews.
voorbeeldzinnen: You are the daughter of my people; you are the one needing the physician.

indicatief_imperatief_herstel.probleem: The 'hear' at the end is not clearly founded on a preceding 'I forgive you'.
indicatief_imperatief_herstel.suggestie: Declare the healing before commanding the hearing.

aanbevelingen.slotopmerking: The sermon is rhetorically beautiful and theologically sound, but it remains a 'monument' to a past word. By shifting from 'talking about' the balm to 'applying' the balm through declarative speech, the sermon will move from a lecture to a sacramental event.

comparatieve_analyse.verschil_met_schulz_von_thun: SvT would focus on the preacher's relationship with his father; SAT focuses on the lack of a 'Creative Word' (Declarative) that actually heals the hearer.
comparatieve_analyse.verschil_met_retoriek: Rhetoric admires the 'Balm' metaphor; SAT asks if the 'Balm' was actually administered to the patient.
comparatieve_analyse.unieke_inzichten_SAT: SAT reveals that the sermon's 'constative surplus' (the history of the sermon's notes) actually hinders its performative power.

kernzinnen_analyse.zin: The points of the sermon are still his.
With his stripes we are healed.
kernzinnen_analyse.effectiviteit: The most performative moment of the sermon.

appendices.notities: The sermon relies heavily on the 'authority of the past' (the father, the 50 years) rather than the 'authority of the present' (the Spirit, the Mandate).
